item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 27, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I got laid off from Meta and created a minor hit on Steam (1032 points | 240 comments)
2. Show HN: Libredesk – Open-source customer support desk. Single binary app (122 points | 22 comments)
3. Winners of the $10k ISBN visualization bounty (319 points | 25 comments)

8. Teslas monitor everything – including you [video] from WIRED (100 points | 63 comments)

10. Geometric Algebra (108 points | 18 comments)
11. Launch HN: Maritime Fusion (YC W25) – Fusion Reactors for Ships (186 points | 199 comments)

13. Show HN: A Database Written in Golang (207 points | 58 comments)

25. A new proposal for how mind emerges from matter (142 points | 124 comments)
26. DARPA Large Bio-Mechanical Space Structures (174 points | 69 comments)
27. Show HN: I created a language called AntiLang – breaking all the conventions (94 points | 66 comments)
28. ForeverVM: Run AI-generated code in stateful sandboxes that run forever (143 points | 42 comments)
29. Writing a .NET Garbage Collector in C# – Part 1 (71 points | 9 comments)
30. Long division verified via Hoare logic (86 points | 46 comments)
